hotels.intro_generic: Find cosy hotel rooms, boutique hotels, and romantic getaways across the world. Use the search and filters to uncover intimate stays with warm design and great reviews.
hotels.intro_city: Find a cosy hotel in {city}. We surface intimate boutique stays with warm design, great reviews and that cosy feel.
